languages.text: "Боженька наш понимающ и заботлив к чадам Своим, и в глазах Его вы все чисты. А эти изуверы-белорясники, что вас корят да стыдят, недостойны даров Его!"

traits.locale_text: "Боженька наш понимающ и заботлив к чадам Своим, и в глазах Его вы все чисты. А энти изуверы-белорясники, что вас корят да стыдят, недостойны даров Его!"

languages.text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"
languages.original_text: "Боженька наш понимающ и заботлив к чадам Своим, и в глазах Его вы все чисты. А эти изуверы-белорясники, что вас корят да стыдят, недостойны даров Его!"

traits.locale_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!
"Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!
"Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!
"Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"
"Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"

languages.text: «Nuestro dios es comprensivo y afectuoso con Sus hijos, y a Sus ojos sois todos puros. ¡Estos monstruos de blancas túnicas que os reprenden y os humillan no son dignos de Sus dones!».
languages.original_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro dios es comprensivo y afectuoso con Sus hijos, y a Sus ojos sois todos puros. ¡Estos monstruos de blancas túnicas que os reprenden y os humillan no son dignos de Sus dones!».

languages.text: 「私たちの神は、ご自分の子供たちを理解し、慈しんでくださる。お前たちを叱りつけ、辱める白衣の怪物どもは、神の賜物にふさわしくない！」
languages.original_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの神は、ご自分の子供たちを理解し、慈しんでくださる。お前たちを叱りつけ、辱める白衣の怪物どもは、神の賜物にふさわしくない！」

languages.text: “我们的神明眷顾祂的儿女。在祂眼中，你们所有人都纯洁无瑕。至于那些辱骂你们、羞辱你们的白袍怪物，他们根本不配得到祂的恩赐！”
languages.original_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的神明眷顾祂的儿女。在祂眼中，你们所有人都纯洁无瑕。至于那些辱骂你们、羞辱你们的白袍怪物，他们根本不配得到祂的恩赐！”

languages.text: "Unser Gott ist verständnisvoll und sorgt für Seine Kinder, und in Seinen Augen seid Ihr alle rein. Und diese weiß gewandeten Monster, die Euch beschimpfen und beschämen, sind Seiner Gaben nicht würdig!"
languages.original_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"

traits.locale_text: "Unser Gott ist verständnisvoll und sorgt für Seine Kinder, und in Seinen Augen seid Ihr alle rein. Und diese weiß gewandeten Monster, die Euch beschimpfen und beschämen, sind Seiner Gaben nicht würdig!"

languages.text: « Notre dieu est compréhensif et attentionné envers Ses enfants, et à Ses yeux, vous êtes tous purs. Quant à ces monstres en robe blanche qui vous tancent et vous méprisent, ils ne sont pas dignes de Ses faveurs ! »
languages.original_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"

traits.locale_text: « Notre dieu est compréhensif et attentionné envers Ses enfants, et à Ses yeux, vous êtes tous purs. Quant à ces monstres en robe blanche qui vous tancent et vous méprisent, ils ne sont pas dignes de Ses faveurs ! »

languages.text: "İlahımız, evlatlarına karşı anlayışlı ve ilgilidir. O'nu gözünde hepiniz pirüpaksınız. Sizi aşağılayıp yeren bu ak urbalı canavarlarsa O'nun lütuflarını hak etmiyor!"
languages.original_text: "Our god is understanding and caring toward His children, and in His eyes you are all pure. And these white-robed monsters, who scold and shame you, are not worthy of His gifts!"
